com.quantcomponents.marketdata
Interface IMarketDataManager

All Superinterfaces:
IPrettyNamed, ISeriesProvider<Date,Double>
public interface IMarketDataManager
extends ISeriesProvider<Date,Double>, IPrettyNamed

Main service interface to create and manage market data time-series

See Also:

searchContracts

List<IContract> searchContracts(IContract criteria,
                                ITaskMonitor taskMonitor)
                                throws ConnectException,
                                       RequestFailedException
Search contracts based on criteria

Parameters:
criteria - a partially filled contract bean, to be used as criteria for search
taskMonitor - a task monitor to control the task
Returns:
a list of contracts matching the criteria
Throws:
ConnectException
RequestFailedException

allStockDatabases

Collection<IStockDatabase> allStockDatabases()
Returns all available stock databases

findStockDatabase

IStockDatabase findStockDatabase(IContract contract,
                                 DataType dataType,
                                 BarSize barSize,
                                 Boolean includeAfterHours)
Search available stock databases based on contract and other parameters. All parameters are optional

Parameters:
contract - the wanted contract, or null
dataType - the wanted data type, or null
barSize - the wanted bar size or null
includeAfterHours - true, false or null
Returns:
the first stock database instance that matches the criteria, or null

getStockDatabase

IStockDatabase getStockDatabase(String ID)
Get a stock database by its persistent ID

Parameters:
ID - the persistent ID
Returns:
a stock database, or null if none could be found

numberOfStockDatabases

int numberOfStockDatabases()
Returns the number of total available stock databases

createStockDatabase

IStockDatabase createStockDatabase(IContract contract,
                                   DataType dataType,
                                   BarSize barSize,
                                   boolean includeAfterHours,
                                   TimeZone timeZone)
Creates a stock database

Parameters:
contract - the contract for which the stock database is created
dataType - the required data type
barSize - the required bar size of the price data
includeAfterHours - true if it must include after hours trading time, false otherwise
timeZone - the time zone for this stock database, normally it should be the default time zone for the contract
Returns:
an empty stock databases

                         throws ConnectException,
                                RequestFailedException
Remove an historical database from the manager

Parameters:
stockDb - the stock database to be removed
Throws:
ConnectException
RequestFailedException

                        Date startDate,
                        Date endDate,
                        ITaskMonitor taskMonitor)
                        throws ConnectException,
                               RequestFailedException
Fills the stock database with the missing historical data

Parameters:
stockDb - stock database to be filled
startDate - start date of the period to be filled
endDate - end date of the period to be filled
taskMonitor - task monitor to control the task
Throws:
ConnectException
RequestFailedException

startRealtimeUpdate

void startRealtimeUpdate(IStockDatabase stockDb,
                         boolean fillHistoricalGap,
                         ITaskMonitor taskMonitor)
                         throws ConnectException,
                                RequestFailedException
Starts the realtime update of prices from the market on a stock database

Parameters:
stockDb - the stock database to be start updating
fillHistoricalGap - true if the gap between the last market data and the current beginning of realtime data must be filled with historical data, false otherwise
taskMonitor - a task monitor to control the task
Throws:
ConnectException
RequestFailedException

stopRealtimeUpdate

                        throws ConnectException,
                               RequestFailedException
Sto the realtime update of prices

Parameters:
stockDb - stock database to stop updating
Throws:
ConnectException
RequestFailedException

                         throws ConnectException,

Parameters:
stockDb - the stock database to query
Throws:
ConnectException
RequestFailedException
